sql-case.value: SELECT order_id, COUNT(1) count FROM t_order o GROUP BY order_id HAVING count > 1 ORDER BY order_id
WITH t_order_tmp AS (SELECT * FROM t_order o) SELECT * FROM t_order_tmp

WITH cte1(status, user_id) AS (SELECT status, user_id FROM t_order a), cte2(user_id, item_id) AS (SELECT user_id, item_id FROM t_order_item b) SELECT status, user_id, item_id FROM cte1 INNER JOIN cte2 ON cte1.user_id = cte2.user_id
WITH t_order_tmp (col1, col2, col3, col4, col5, col6) AS (SELECT * FROM t_order o) SELECT col1 FROM t_order_tmp
SELECT order_id AS orderId, (SELECT orderId) AS tempOrderId FROM t_order
